story_summary: Miüsov and Pyotr Fomitch Kalganov arrive at the monastery with Fyodor Pavlovitch and Ivan, while Dmitri is late. They are guided by Maximov and a monk to the hermitage to meet Father Zossima, despite some awkwardness and Fyodor Pavlovitch's disruptive behavior. Upon arrival, they observe the surroundings and prepare to meet the elder, with Miüsov feeling irritated and anticipating a quarrel.
evidence_quotes: Miüsov and a distant relative of his, a young man called Pyotr Fomitch Kalganov.
The Father Superior invites all of you gentlemen to dine with him after your visit.
